D

DateCursor - Class in cursor
 
DateCursor() - Constructor for class cursor.DateCursor
Initialize with empty structures to prevent null pointers Attach a listener to the slider which refreshes the windbarbs on change Even if no data is entered in this constructor, the cursor is fully functional and only needs new data as input by calling setNewDates()
DateCursor(List<Date>, Date) - Constructor for class cursor.DateCursor
Initialize a cursor Sorts the list and initializes the slider Attach a ChangeListener to the slider which refreshes the windbarbs on change
defaultUnit - Variable in class facade.MeteoFacade
 
definirPlageHoraire(Contraste, Date, Date) - Method in class modification.ServicesModification
Méthode permettant de définir la plage horaire d'un contraste.
definirSeuilEtCoefficient(Contraste, double, double) - Method in class modification.ServicesModification
Méthode permettant de définir le seuil et coefficient d'un contraste.
definirZonePrevision(Contraste, double, double, double, double) - Method in class modification.ServicesModification
Méthode permettant de définir une zone de prévision.
DelayedRefresh - Class in cursor
This class is used to delay a call to refresh the windbarbs when the slider has changed Use this to prevent loading too much windbarbs at once into the RAM The display will only be refreshed when the slider hasn't change value for a determined period of time
delayRefresh(DateCursor) - Static method in class cursor.DelayedRefresh
Use this method to delay a call to refresh the screen with the date selected by the DateCursor object The method handles the instantiation of the class.
displayDate(Prevision, Date) - Method in class facade.MeteoFacade
Affiche les données des vents à la date sélectionnée en paramètre.
displayWindbarbs(ArrayList<WindBarb>) - Method in class view.FlatWorld.AppFrame
Affiche les barbules sur la carte.
